FindRomance, 1054 Centre St. Suite 214, Thornhill, ON, L4J8E5 If you wish to remove yourself from further SeekingMarriage mailings please visit our site.

Should you wish to unsubscribe from the list owner who sent you this email, please follow the unsubscription information below:





This email advertisement was sent by TargaComm. To stop receiving emails from us, please visit this link. You may also contact us at this address: TargaComm, PO Box 530602, DeBary, FL 32753 Attn: Customer Care.
